oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ||kabbo tells of death: 'This path is a Bushman's path, the First Bushman's path, the Korannas, Boers, etc, also go on it. When Bushmen are dead and buried in the ground, they walk out along this path; they reach the great hole, and they live there ...'
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ||kabbo tells of death, the hole, and the path of the First Bushmen
